mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user (username, userid, userpwd, userpn) values (#{username}, #{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{userpn})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_user where userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from tbl_user where username = #{username} and userpn = #{userpn}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set userpwd = #{userpwd}, update_date = NOW() where userpn = #{userpn}
